main_definition: Seasons refer to the four distinct periods of the year, marked by specific weather conditions and daylight hours due to Earth's orbit around the Sun.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Periodical divisions in a calendar year
meanings_and_examples.example: My favorite seasons are spring and autumn because of the mild temperatures.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A popular phrase used to describe life's stages, based on the cyclical nature of the Earth's orbit around the Sun
meanings_and_examples.example: Like the changing seasons, our lives go through different phases as well. Just like in spring we grow and bloom, there will be times when we flourish and succeed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A musical term referring to changes in melody or mood within a piece
meanings_and_examples.example: The symphony had beautiful transitions between the seasons of each movement. The winter section was particularly haunting.
